|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTM-328ACN_WiFi_V03" is silkscreened on the CPU board.
"WRTM-328ACN_Power_V03" is silkscreened on the MCU board. :OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTM-328ACN ===Hardware specifications=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz (MIPS 24KEc) *WLAN: 802.11bgn (2T2R) WiSoC + 802.11ac (1T1R) *RAM: 64MB (DDR2 SDRAM) *Storage: 16MB (Serial Flash) *Battery: 5400mAh 3.8V (Li-ion) ==See also== *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless G1 (MLW221)]] • [https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlw221 PPage] *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless G2 (MLWG2)]] • [https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlwg2 PPage] *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless G3 (MLWG3)]] • [https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlwg3 PPage] *[[Kingston MobileLite Wireless Pro (MLWPro)]] • 64GB storage [[Category:English Documentation]]
